Assigns contents to an error condition.

@1@ Assigns error condition for enum {{tt|e}}. Effectively calls {{tt|make_error_condition}} that is only found by [[cpp/language/adl|argument-dependent lookup]] for {{tt|e}} and then replaces {{c|*this}} with the result. {{cpp/enable_if|{{c|std::is_error_condition_enum&lt;ErrorConditionEnum&gt;::value}} is {{c|true}}}}.

@2,3@ Implicitly defined copy-assignment operator and move-assignment operator assign the contents of {{tt|other}} to {{c|*this}}.

{{par begin}}
{{par | e | error condition enum}}
{{par | other | another error condition to assign with}}
{{par end}}

{{c|*this}}.
